custom_power_profile_mode_hueristics.description: Outer vector is for power profile components, inner vector is for the heuristics within a component

rp0_freq.description: - rp0_freq: The Render Performance (RP) 0 level, which is the maximum one.

rpe_freq.description: - rpe_freq: The Render Performance (RP) E level, which is the efficient one.

rpn_freq.description: - rpn_freq: The Render Performance (RP) N level, which is the minimal one.
